Html:
Ridiculous, there are many videos, but how can I get Naudio Class library reference guide?
Reference guide means, some collection of Naudio Classes and it's brief explanations.
Why Can't I found it easily?
Somebody help me.

There are tools to generate documentation (HTML or MS Help File) out of a .NET assembly.
Sandcastle is probably the best one at the moment:
http://shfb.codeplex.com/
